content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in ragusa on january 2 2011 the case number is 68 but unfortunately it does not provide any information about the parties involved or the details of the case the court has determined the costs of the proceedings and divided them among the parties based on their individual shares the court ruled in favor of the plaintiff awarding them a total of euro 1184800 additionally fg gam and gml were also awarded different amounts the court rejected the requests and objections made by the parties and ordered the dissolution of the community property between the plaintiff and defendants the courtappointed expert filed reports on the properties involved in the case the court ordered the payment of a balance sum to the plaintiff and defendants along with legal interest the costs of the proceedings were divided among the parties the court made a decision regarding a claim brought by gl against defendants fg gam and gml the court rejected opposing requests and objections and ordered the dissolution of the community property between the parties the courtappointed expert witness filed reports describing the properties involved the court determined the ownership of the properties and ordered gl to pay a sum to gam and gml the costs of the proceedings were allocated among the parties and the decision was made on january 26 2011 in ragusa
